articles.title: New Apple TV+ hit found a clever way to reject feedback from Apple execs - 9to5Mac
articles.description: The latest Apple TV+ hit, The Studio, inadvertently made itself immune to lots of feedback from Apple execs with this clever technique.
articles.content: This weeks big Apple TV+ debut, The Studio, has impressed critics and already climbed to the #2 spot on Apples top charts, trailing only Severance. In a new interview, co-creator and star Seth Rogen … [+2281 chars]
